overview: The story is about the life of a bored Maths professor, who never speaks to his family. His wife and daughter are always watching television. One day, when his family is not at home and the television is off, the professor gets disturbs by the silence and switches on the TV. Strangely, he sees a man just like him on TV, and watches his future.  This is a short film that Bejoy Nambiar directed for the reality contest Gateway to Hollywood in 2008.
title: Soap
